price: Irra hedduun isaaniis qindeessitoota ta’anii malee Rabbitti hin amananu.
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
